content.rendered:
Take advantage of the warm weather to make your floors shine!

Whatever your problem, we can fix it, with a full selection of floor finishes and sealers, including Green Seal products.

We highly recommend iShine, Spartan’s most popular floor finish.  Containing 25% high solids with patented, optically enhanced polymer technology, this finish beautifully amplifies overall gloss and clarity of floors.
